__e: Oh, no, hon. I think the doctors said they need you to stay here for a couple of days for observation.
Okay. From where you stand, what is the best vantage point to see the shop?
Anyway, gave me some time to make a few observations of my own.
Really? Then why am I now off your radar and in your Chinese restaurant?
I hope so. And you, señorita, with what do you occupy yourself? I'm a writer.
Well, that is a valid point, but, uh, tough crap.
Another day of observation and you're all clear.
I overheard your last remark and take the gravest exception.
- Everyone, I was just up on the observation deck and saw a bunch of mecha-suit soldiers heading this way! - Oh, great!
